# rbooty

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

rbooty provides comprehensive functions for bootstrapping.

## Installation

You can install the the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("lana1218/rbooty")
```

```{r}
library(rbooty)
```
